titles.title: Christ The Lord Is Risen Today

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Christ the Lord is risen today, Alleluia! newline Sons of men and angels say: Alleluia! newline Raise your joys and triumphs high, Alleluia! newline Sing, ye heavens and earth reply: Alleluia!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Lives again our glorious King, Alleluia! newline Where, O death, is now thy sting? Alleluia! newline Dying once He all doth save, Alleluia! newline Where thy victory, O grave? Alleluia!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Love's redeeming work is done, Alleluia! newline Fought the fight, the battle won, Alleluia! newline Death in vain forbids Him rise, Alleluia! newline Christ hath opened paradise, Alleluia!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Soar we now where Christ has led, Alleluia! newline Following our exalted Head, Alleluia! newline Made like Him, like Him we rise, Alleluia! newline Ours the cross, the grave, the skies, Alleluia!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Vain the stone, the watch, the seal, newline Hallelujah! newline Christ hath burst the gates of hell, newline Hallelujah! newline Death in vain forbids His rise, newline Hallelujah! newline Christ hath opened paradise, newline Hallelujah!
